resources.string: Jane Eyre is a novel written by Charlotte Brontë in 1847. The novel follows the story of Jane, a seemingly plain and simple girl as she battles through life s struggles. Jane has many obstacles in her life her cruel and abusive Aunt Reed, the grim conditions at Lowood school, her love for Rochester and Rochester s marriage to Bertha. However, Jane overcomes these obstacles through her determination, sharp wit and courage.
